attributes.action: Force all social media companies to verify accounts
attributes.additional_details: This is simple and would eradicate all online abuse as people can't hide behind fake accounts
attributes.background: Force all social media companies (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Snapchat etc.)  to verify accounts - make people confirm their identity by showing an identity document to create or continue with an account.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598012
